note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Add links from CLI to pocket
body: # py-pouch Add links from CLI to your Pocket account. Usage: py-pouch.py [url] If you have not authorized yet, the program will give you the URL to authorize at getpocket.com. After authorization links given as arguments are saved directly to Pocket ## newsbeuter integration Just add bookmark-cmd "~/bin/py-pouch.py" to your configuration file. The error messages are already optimized for newsbeuter. Remember to authorize by manually running py-pouch once.
name: Py-pouch
